thread.title: Designer Catches a LOT of Heat for Melania Comment, But We Think He’s 100% Right
thread.title_full: Designer Catches a LOT of Heat for Melania Comment, But We Think He’s 100% Right

author: K. Campbell
title: Designer Catches a LOT of Heat for Melania Comment, But We Think He’s 100% Right
text:
UNREAL: Reporter Passes New Obama Home, Snaps Pic of New WALL Going Up 
The photo showed Melania, a longtime client of the Italian clothing brand, sportingÂ a black Dolce & Gabbana cocktail dress with bows on each shoulderÂ at Trumpâs New Yearâs Eve celebrationÂ in Palm Beach, Florida. 
Gabbana, who made no mention of politics in his Instagram post, nevertheless was attacked by liberals who disagreed with Trumpâs policies and perceived his simple âthanksâ to Melania as an endorsement of her husband. 
In fact,Â hundreds of people commented on the post, threatening to boycott the designerâs label, The Washington Times reported .   
But Gabbana did not back down or retract his statement. Instead, he personally responded to several comments and reiteratedÂ his support for the future first lady. 
âHow many stupid and ignorant people r on instagram!!!!â the fashion designer wrote in response to the critics. âPlease if you dont like my post unfollow me âŚ thank u.â 
To one naysayer in particular, Gabbana explained thatÂ he liked Melania and that she was a âbeautiful woman,â Yahoo News reported . A photo posted by stefanogabbana (@stefanogabbana) on Jan 1, 2017 at 4:44pm PST
